titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a windfall profit tax on certain drugs for rare diseases or conditions if they become excessively profitable, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1851-1852)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1883-1884)

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a windfall profits tax (after recovery of the total investment in drug development) on the profits from orphan drugs for rare diseases or conditions.
